code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{ChakraProvider,Box,Button,extendTheme,Flex,Heading,HStack}from'@chakra-ui/react';import{SocketProvider}from'./contexts/SocketContext';import{ProviderView}from'./components/ProviderView';import{PatientView}from'./components/PatientView';import'@fontsource/open-sans';import'@fontsource/raleway';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const theme=extendTheme({fonts:{heading:"'Open Sans', sans-serif"}});function App(){const[view,setView]=useState('patient');return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ChakraProvider,{theme:theme,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SocketProvider,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{minH:"100vh",bg:"gray.50",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{bg:"blue.500",color:"white",p:4,shadow:"md",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Flex,{maxW:"1200px",mx:"auto",justify:"space-between",align:"center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(HStack,{spacing:3,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Heading,{size:"lg",children:"Welcome to Springfield Hospital"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Heading,{fontSize:"18",fontStyle:"italic",fontWeight:"light",children:"Where People Come First"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Flex,{gap:4,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{colorScheme:view==='patient'?'whiteAlpha':'blue',variant:view==='patient'?'solid':'outline',onClick:()=>setView('patient'),children:"Patient View"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{colorScheme:view==='provider'?'whiteAlpha':'blue',variant:view==='provider'?'solid':'outline',onClick:()=>setView('provider'),children:"Provider View"})]})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{maxW:"1200px",mx:"auto",py:8,children:view==='provider'?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProviderView,{}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PatientView,{})})]})})});}export default App;
